  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SteerableEntityController
extends EntityController
implements com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.Steerable<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2>, com.badlogic.gdx.ai.steer.Proximity.ProximityCallback<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2>
    Controls a entity that have a steering behavior.
